DataElement.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System Parent Rating Form General Adaptive Composite Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the composite score for the General Adaptive Composite (GAC) in the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System Parent Form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form General Adaptive Composite Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 5 to 21 years that is used to evaluate children with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care._An overall score of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System that consists of the three domains of conceptual, social, and practical._Including everything._A single value that is calculated from multiple scores. This composite score can then be used as a single variable in further analysis and comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form General Adaptive Composite Score

This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care.:An overall score of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System that consists of the three domains of conceptual, social, and practical.

Concepts.longName: Adaptive Behavior Assessment System, Parent Rating Form
Concepts.definition: A comprehensive norm-referenced assessment of the adaptive skills of individuals ages 5 to 21 years that is used to evaluate children with intellectual and developmental disabilities. This form is completed by parents or others responsible for the child's primary care.
An overall score of the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System that consists of the three domains of conceptual, social, and practical.

Property.preferredDefinition: Including everything.:A single value that is calculated from multiple scores. This composite score can then be used as a single variable in further analysis and comparison.

Concepts.definition: A single value that is calculated from multiple scores. This composite score can then be used as a single variable in further analysis and comparison.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity calculated from data in multiple variables in order to form reliable and valid measures from the Adaptive Behavior Assessment System.
